ruling: - If there is a monster equipped with [[Ring of Magnetism]] on the opponent's side of the field, if your monsters are going to attack they must attack the equipped monster.  Even Toon Monsters, [[Inaba White Rabbit]], and monsters like [[Jinzo #7]] and [[Queen's Double]] that can normally Attack Directly must attack the equipped monster.
- If you have two or more monsters on your side of the field equipped with your [[Ring of Magnetism]] cards, you choose which monster will be attacked.
